wikipedia_page.main: Nick Pinkney (born 6 December 1970) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played as a winger in the 1980s, 1990s and 2000s. He played at representative level for England, and at club level for Ryedale-York, the Keighley Cougars, the Sheffield Eagles, Halifax, the Salford City Reds and the Hull Kingston Rovers.
